snippet.title: SpyFall - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
SpyFall Steam Page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3334280/SpyFall/

MB Studio Discord : https://discord.gg/AKS5yQbqE8

Welcome to Spyfall, a pulse-pounding multiplayer game where trust is scarce, and the stakes are high. Set in a dynamic urban environment teeming with life, Spyfall puts you and your friends in the middle of a thrilling game of deception, strategy, and survival.

In a city alive with NPCs, five players take on unique roles. One becomes the relentless police officer, tasked with uncovering spies hidden among the bustling crowd. The other four assume the roles of citizens—spies with a mission. Their goal? Complete covert tasks across the city without raising suspicion and, above all, avoid getting caught.
The police officer must use sharp observational skills and quick thinking to separate players from NPCs and bring the spies to justice. Meanwhile, the spies must stay one step ahead, blending seamlessly into the environment, avoiding detection, and fulfilling their objectives.

With its immersive city setting, full of roads, towering buildings, and interactive elements, Spyfall challenges players to think creatively, adapt to the chaos, and outsmart their opponents.



Will you play the part of the perfect spy and escape unnoticed, or will you become the ultimate law enforcer, exposing the traitors among the crowd?

The city is watching. The game begins.


#mb_studio #spyfall
